result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael J Tomaschefsky was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: BAIL APPLIED. Court Costs and DNA PAID IN FULL.
Maintain full time employment and/or school.
Submit to an AODA Assessment and follow through with any treatment/counseling.

No contact with  Alyssa without the authorization of the Agent and Agent to instruct the terms.
Domestic Violence counseling through a State certified batterers intervention program.
Anger Management.
Provide DNA sample of not already done.
Cases 15CF521, 15CF511, 15CF523 are dismissed and read into: 14CM1553 and 14CF726.

with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Michael J Tomaschefsky in court, in custody, with attorney Mark E. Kershek.   Andrea Will appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant enters a plea of no contest to Count 2,  Court finds defendant guilty. Cts. 1, 3 and 4 dismissed and read-in. Apply bail to this matter and 14CM1553. 

Court orders the following: 
Ct. 2:
- 9 months jail straight time STAYED for 2 years Probation - consecutive to 14CM1553
- Court Costs of $343.00 (includes DV Surcharge) - apply bail 
- DNA Surcharge of $200.00 - apply bail
- Conditions of  Probation:   Follow thru with any treatment/counseling recommended by Agent. Maintain full-time employment and/or combination of schooling. No contact with Alyssa without the authorization of the Agent and Agent to instruct the terms. Domestic violence counseling through a State certified batterers intervention program. Anger Management. Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided and surcharge.
- 2 months jail with huber Condition Time (nonworking hours) commencing FORTHWITH - consecutive to 14CM1553.  Non-working hours with standard release conditions.

Expunction addressed.
Court denies motion for expunction on all charges.
